title: Sensory Friendly Santa - A Super Mario Brothers Annual Holiday Celebration
desc: AUTISM SOCIETY?GREATER LONG BEACH/SAN GABRIEL VALLEY?S? It's not necessary to have a printed ticket, we will have registration list.? Yes, please feel free to have your child's behavioral technician (BT) attend event if their needs require intervention of any sort. We DO NOT PROVIDE a behavioral aide for your child. Share this event with your BT and have them register under the Behavioral Technician RSVP, they do not need to indicate whom they are accompanying.? No, we do not have child care staff and also are not responsible for your child in the case of an accident or injury occurring without parental supervision. Please do not leave your children unsupervised.
